rules_text: When Makshi, Patron of Blades enters, search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast Equipment spells and activate abilities of Equipment.
flavor_text: [i]“Take pride, mortal. You've forged such lovely tools of destruction before your end.”[/i]
